hours_text:
# Visit Us

### Location

**Elmhurst Art Museum**  
150 S. Cottage Hill Avenue  
Elmhurst, Illinois 60126  
(630) 834-0202

**The Museum is closed Wednesday, December 24th & Thursday, December 25th and December 31st and January 1st.**

**Open December 26th - 28th!**

Monday-Tuesday: closed

Wednesday-Thursday: 12PM – 5PM

Friday-Sunday: 11AM – 5PM

The Museum is closed on federal holidays.

[Elmhurst Dining Guide](https://elmhurstcitycentre.com/directory/dining-dropdown) and [Map](https://elmhurstcitycentre.com/merchant-map-menu)

### Admission

Tickets are not necessary for Museum Members on any day!

[Become a member](https://www.elmhurstartmuseum.org/support/membership/) for free entry anytime, first access, and more.

Guest| Price  
---|---  
Adults| $18.00  
Seniors (65+)| $15.00  
Students (18+) with School ID| $10.00  
Children (5 - 17)| $5.00  
Kiddies (4 & under)| Free  
Members| Free  
  
Admission includes access to the McCormick House and the Elmhurst Artist Guild.

Children must be accompanied by a paying adult.

[Free with admission](https://eam-shop.myshopify.com/collections/online-shop/tickets): **two** self-guided outdoor walking tours of Elmhurst’s public art and modern architecture. Visit our [Tours page](https://www.elmhurstartmuseum.org/visit/tours/) for details or inquire at our front desk.

The Elmhurst Art Museum is a member of the North American Reciprocal Museum Association (NARM). Members at the Premium ($150) level receive free admission and recipr...

collections_text:
# Museum closed for installation

### From January 5th to 23rd. Reopening January 24th!

[Come see our next exhibition](https://elmhurstartmuseum.org/exhibitions/Living%20With%20Modernism)

# Living with Modernism: Kelli Connell 

### Opening Reception January 23rd!

[Learn more about the exhibition](https://elmhurstartmuseum.org/exhibitions/Living%20With%20Modernism)

# Create & Learn - Sign up for a Camp or Class Today

### 

[Learn More](https://shop.elmhurstartmuseum.org/collections/online-shop)

# The McCormick House 

### Experience contemporary art by Bernard Williams in this single family home designed by Ludwig Mies van der Rohe.

[Learn More](https://elmhurstartmuseum.org/events/McCormick%20House%20Tour)

# Elmhurst Art Museum: Where art is for everyone 

# Events

### Upcoming Events

* * *

[ Jan 24, 12:00 AM–3:00 AM Opening Reception for Living With Modernism: Kelli ConnellMeet Kelli Connell and preview her newest photographs alongside iconic photographs by Edward Weston.](/events/Living%20With%20Modernism%20Opening%20Reception)

[ Feb 7, 7:00 PM–9:00 PM Create With UsKelli Connell leads a drop-in workshop for all ages and talks about her practice.](/events/Create%20With%20Us:%20Kelli%20Connell)

[TOUR Feb 8, 7:00 PM–8:00 PM McCormick House TourDocents leads a tour of our house designed by Mies van der Rohe.](/events/McCormick%20House%20Tour%20-%20Feb%208)
